channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Anger and outrage spills onto Minneapolis streets after ICE officer’s fatal shooting of Renee Good
item.description: Anger and outrage are spilling out onto Minneapolis’ streets over the fatal shooting of a woman the day before by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer.

item.title: Federal immigration officers shoot and wound 2 people in Portland, Oregon, authorities say
Fatal ICE shooting sparks jurisdiction clash between state and federal authorities
